results.title: Repurposing simvastatin for treatment of Klebsiella pneumoniae infections: in vitro and in vivo study.
results.text_hl: Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ has significantly improved the survival of @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ and decreased the burden of @<m>DISEASE_Mysophobia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000719206 @@@bacteria@@@ in the @DISEASE_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infected@@@ lungs.
